article: sen. joe biden spent his first day as an official presidential candidate regretting his description of democratic rival sen. barack obama as `` clean , '' and explaining why he had harshly criticized sen. hillary rodham clinton .
abstract: biden enters presidential race deals with controversial comments about rivals
